SELECT sjname, count( degree ) * 2 FROM ksda k LEFT JOIN testquestion tq ON tq.stid = k.stid LEFT JOIN students st ON st.khid = k.khid LEFT JOIN dj ON dj.khid = st.khid LEFT JOIN sj ON sj.sjid = dj.sjid WHERE k.dacontain = tq.answer and sname like '${name}'
SELECT zyname, khid, sname, ssex FROM students s LEFT JOIN zy ON s.zyid = zy.zyid WHERE s.sname like '${name}'
